briefdescription.para: Property that bridging control's property between XAML and code.
Is list allows to drag elements.

detaileddescription.para: Can be true only in case ifIsFixedSize is false.

briefdescription.para: Reference to the list box that will contains spawned elements.
Source collection applied to the UI.

detaileddescription.para: Object must has implemented IList interface.

briefdescription.para: Member from UIDescriptor binded to the UI leement.
UI elemets existing into the current collection.
Collection that contains instiniated GUI fields.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the element to get or set

simplesect.para: The element at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: index is not a valid index in the System.Collections.IList.
The property is set and the System.Collections.IList is read-only.

briefdescription.para: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Collections.IList is read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the System.Collections.IList has a fixed size.
Gets the number of elements contained in the System.Collections.ICollection.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the System.Collections.ICollection.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the System.Collections.ICollection is synchronized (thread safe).
Will occure when source or one from elements will change.
Mapp of GUI elements binding. IGUIField - key int - index in the list.
Bufer that contains source sollection.
Default constructor.
Adds an item to the System.Collections.IList.

parameterdescription.para: The object to add to the System.Collections.IList.

simplesect.para: The position into which the new element was inserted, or -1 to indicate that the item was not inserted into the collection.

parameterdescription.para: The System.Collections.IList is read-only.-or- The System.Collections.IList has a fixed size.-or- IGUIField for the object type not registred.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the System.Collections.IList contains a specific value.

parameterdescription.para: The object to locate in the System.Collections.IList.

simplesect.para: true if the System.Object is found in the System.Collections.IList; otherwise, false.

detaileddescription.para: In case if value is IGUIField then looking via registred UI fileds.-or- Otherwise looking via the source list.

briefdescription.para: Removes all items from the System.Collections.IList.

parameterdescription.para: The System.Collections.IList is read-only.

briefdescription.para: Determines the index of a specific item in the System.Collections.IList.

parameterdescription.para: The object to locate in the System.Collections.IList.

simplesect.para: The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.

detaileddescription.para: In case if value is IGUIField then looking via registred UI fileds.-or- Otherwise looking via the source list.

briefdescription.para: Inserts an item to the System.Collections.IList at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert into the System.Collections.IList.
index is not a valid index in the System.Collections.IList.
The System.Collections.IList is read-only.-or- The System.Collections.IList has a fixed size.
value is null reference in the System.Collections.IList.

briefdescription.para: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the System.Collections.IList.

parameterdescription.para: The object to remove from the System.Collections.IList.
The System.Collections.IList is read-only.-or- The System.Collections.IList has a fixed size.

briefdescription.para: Removes the System.Collections.IList item at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
index is not a valid index in the System.Collections.IList.
The System.Collections.IList is read-only.-or- The System.Collections.IList has a fixed size.

briefdescription.para: Copies the elements of the source to an System.Array, starting at a particular System.Array index.

parameterdescription.para: The one-dimensional System.Array that is the destination of the elements copied from System.Collections.ICollection. The System.Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
array is null.
index is less than zero.

array is multidimensional.-or- The number of elements in the source System.Collections.ICollection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.-or-The type of the source System.Collections.ICollection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.

briefdescription.para: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

simplesect.para: An System.Collections.IEnumerator object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

briefdescription.para: Configurating collection and binding element to the descriptors handler.
Requiesting recomputing of the elements width.
Configurating styles applyed to the controls.
Regestrating element for source collection. Allow to create bachward binding of UI to the source object.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the element into the source collection.

briefdescription.para: Occurs when field's valu will be changed via UI element.

parameterdescription.para: The GUI element that initialize event.

briefdescription.para: Occurs when item is selected by LMB click.
Occurs when an element was droped after drag.
Abstract class that provides common API for implementin collection controls.

detaileddescription.para: Fully compatible with UIDescriptor and auto layout handlers.
